item.title: ‘He is increasingly angry’: My troubled son lives with me. How do I ensure he is financially secure after I die?
item.description: “Our family does have a long history of interventions, including hospitalizations.”

item.title: My husband sold his IRA without my knowledge prior to our divorce. Is this legal?
item.description: “Is it legal for one member of a married couple to authorize the sale of an IRA in a joint-managed account?”

item.title: ‘I’m scared for her’: My wife, 48, is financially illiterate. I’m 67. What happens when I die?
item.description: “We have a 12-year-old daughter. I have $1.1 million in a traditional IRA and $250,000 in cash.”
